title: Arkana the Lethal Virus [Fanmade champion]

embed.description: Rendered in MikuMikuDance More info: www.artstation.com/artwork/rBB… ===================================== Effects: Auto Luminous, surplusfi... Arkana: The lethal Virus [League of legends champ]

body:
I'm currently working on her design seeing as the first was too mature. Her abillitys still need work also

Primary role: Mage
Secondary role: Support

Arkana Abillitys:
Passive: System freeze
After striking an enemy 4 times in succession, 
they are silenced for 1.5 seconds. Cannot be used on the 
same target more than once every 6 seconds.
Q: Virus incoming
Arkana sends out 3 viruses that latch themselves on nearby
targets doing damage for 3 seconds
- Prioritieses champions
-Any minions hit will attack nearby targets while this ability
is active
Mana cost: 80
CD: 20sec
w: Infection
Arkana tethers herself to an ally or enemy champion and 
briefly shielding her from incoming damage until the 
link is broken by distance.
- Ally: Boosts AD and Speeds Up
- Enemy: Lowers AD and Slows
Mana cost: 60
CD: 15sec
E: Search and destroy
Arkana send's out 2 drones targeting nearby champions
and revealing their location for 2 seconds
mana cost: 70
CD: 20sec
R: System override
Arkana Hacks in to an enemy champ stealing their abilitys and
making them her own for 20 seconds not including their ult
CD: 200sec

nice repost. also terrible champion idea from the sprite to the abilities. also extermely vague abilities. why does a supportive champ have a 4hit passive? why does she get a free twin shadows every 20 seconds? and thats without considering CDR. serisously man i dont even know

shes still under works, this was just a rough draft of her really.
I just wanted to get the idea out there.
She's more of a mid lane champion but she can support. if you had any ideas that could help me out i'd appreciate it.
bravo you are what trolls aspire to be :)
